about_the_game:
DISCLAIMER

- You need to own "College Kings 2: Episode 2 - The Pool Party" in order to play Episode 3.

- Episode 3 contains about 1.5-2 hours of gameplay for a single playthrough, with about 4 hours of total unique content.

OVERVIEW


College Kings 2 Episode 3 is going back to its roots. Entirely written by Undergrad Steve, it aims to bring back the original magic to the College Kings series.

THE STORY CONTINUES


With the second most important fighting tournament of the year on the horizon, the frats will struggle for survival as a newly appointed auditor is looking to end the violence once and for all.

Meanwhile, Nora throws a schoolwide sleepover hoping to unite the students against this new threat.

THE COLLEGE KINGS YOU KNOW AND LOVE


Fighting, parties, love, and sex. College Kings is going back to its roots with authentic characters, passionate sex scenes, and incredibly fun dates.

Whether you want to stay in a 5-star hotel with Aubrey, stargaze in a hot tub with Nora, or get it on in a locker room with Chloe, the choice is yours.

SUPER HOT SEX SCENES


Bondage, free use, roleplay… Ever been sucked off by two girls at once? This episode is filled with 15 new sex scenes (8 of which include penetration) ranging from romantic passion to filthy domination.

REAL CONSEQUENCES FOR YOUR CHOICES


Are you going to betray your frat? Or secretly juggling multiple girlfriends? With many new impactful choices and serious consequences for previous ones, it’s up to you how the story plays out.

WHAT ELSE TO EXPECT


Two big free roams (a chill sleepover at SVC and an out-of-control frat party), skinny dipping, a strip club, multiple fights (including a tournament), tons of romantic dates, and fun hangouts with friends.

With what we’ve learned from Episode 2 and the free major update that followed, we’ve worked hard to improve our writing, plot, and storytelling to create what we feel will be an episode much more in line with the College Kings we all know and love.

This episode seamlessly integrates with all Lovense toys, so you can experience the sex scenes more intensely than ever before.

content_descriptors.notes: College Kings contains sexual depictions, violence and drug references that some viewers may find offensive. All sex in the game is consensual and all characters are over 18 years old. This Adult Visual Novel is not intended for audiences under 18 years old.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Version 10.11+
  • Processor: 2.0GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

name: College Kings 2 - Episode 3 'Back To Basics'

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy College Kings 2 - Episode 3 'Back To Basics'

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.0GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Fighting, parties, love and sex. College Kings is going back to its roots with authentic characters, passionate sex scenes and incredibly fun dates. Experience the original CK magic in an episode entirely written by Undergrad Steve.
